summary: “The Briarwoods are very charming. You were expecting this very dour dark evil couple from all the conversation but, they seem...
caption:
“The Briarwoods are very charming. You were expecting this very dour dark evil couple from all the conversation but, they seem nice. They seem earnest. They keep to themselves definitely, they’re definitely a very tight couple but nothing about them catches you off guard as being anything instinctively twisted.” ~ Matthew Mercer

Sylas is @phoskios

Delilah is Me

Photo by FilmandQuill (IG)

summary: ok im sure this exists Somewhere, so is there a place to read synopses of critical role episodes? not just transcripts, but...
body:
ok im sure this exists Somewhere, so is there a place to read synopses of critical role episodes? not just transcripts, but descriptions of what happened in an episode? or each arc or s/t?

i really want to get into CR but i have a really hard time consuming it in the format it’s in. 

help a girl out?

blog.name: blurrycriticalroleposts
blog.title: WE DON'T DO ANYTHING WITH DIGNITY
blog.description:
This is a thing now. Is it a blessing or a curse? Critical Role, galore! 
Tags
- Ally, Felicia, and Stacey.   
---
---

summary: I’m saying this now, and it needs to be said.
body:
I’m saying this now, and it needs to be said.

The cast of Critical Role being in the know and keeping up to date with societal and political situations - good or bad - and showing support is important. I firmly believe that if they weren’t doing so, they would be doing us a disservice.

That is all.

I would love to open up a discussion - but I will not be doing it here. If you’d like to, I’m @maxbegone

- Ally

tags: anyway I've been wanting to write more cr fic and it felt good to finally have an idea
summary: Messages in Yeast - hufflepirate - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Messages in Yeast - hufflepirate - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
This was supposed to be a little bit of fluff about Nott stealing food out of Cad’s kitchen while he was cooking, but instead it’s a mildly angsty character study about our good cow cleric and his goddess. Plus a little bit of fluff about Nott routinely stealing food out of Cad’s kitchen.

AO3 summary: When Caduceus finds himself back at home with 5 friends and 0 of the solutions he’d gone looking for, he can feel the pressure of how wrong it is. Baking helps. So does talking out what his friends are to him.

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I love the headcanon that firbolgs like to sleep in a cuddle pile, so to expand on that, after all his family left Caduceus...
body: I love the headcanon that firbolgs like to sleep in a cuddle pile, so to expand on that, after all his family left Caduceus starts sleeping with a lot of extra pillows so the nights don’t feel so lonely. He needs at least one extra pillow to cuddle with or he has a real hard time falling asleep. He also would be 100% down to share a bed and snuggle with any and all members of the M9 if they wanted, but he doesn’t feel like he’s close enough to ask that of them yet. He likes them all a lot and doesn’t want to impose or make them uncomfortable (but he does miss the cuddle piles very much.)

reblog.comment: I love the headcanon that firbolgs like to sleep in a cuddle pile, so to expand on that, after all his family left Caduceus starts sleeping with a lot of extra pillows so the nights don’t feel so lonely. He likes them all a lot and doesn’t want to impose or make them uncomfortable (but he does miss the cuddle piles very much.)

blog.name: flightofstars
blog.title: Flight of Stars: Let's Write Together

summary: Fic Post: [Critical Role] Eight of Swords
title: Fic Post: [Critical Role] Eight of Swords
body:
Summary: Whenever Caleb travels via familiar, he trusts the others to keep him safe. Mollymauk thinks the Mighty Nein take this responsibility too lightly. He’s right.

Excerpt:

He knelt in front of the vulnerable wizard. It gave him satisfaction that the human fit neatly between his knees. If he’d wanted to make this short, he could have snapped the man’s neck. Instead, he breathed. Something, the warmth or the smell, reached beyond the fey veil. The man stirred and gave a very slow blink, as one in the midst of a dream. His chin tipped up, gazing at the enemy looming over him with unseeing eyes, and in a soft, accented voice that Talisman remembered from the square, he asked, “Fjord?”

An actual sigh of pleasure slipped from his lips. It was too perfect. “No, my dear.” He lifted two fingers, and in a voice of Power, he touched the man’s temple. “Lock.”

Read more: here (Ao3) or here (FF.net)

Author’s Note: During my first time through Critical Role, it intrigued me that a character like Caleb, who was otherwise so guarded, so readily entrusted himself to virtual strangers while using his familiar, especially early in their acquaintanceship. Which got me thinking; what if Caleb ended up in a dangerous situation as a result of their (accidental) carelessness? What kind of trauma would that cause, and what impact would it have on the group’s resulting social contract?

summary: Okay guys! Tomorrow’s the day. October is finally upon us, which means the start of Crinktober! We are so excited to see what...
caption: Okay guys! Tomorrow’s the day. October is finally upon us, which means the start of Crinktober! We are so excited to see what all of you come up with. Remember to tag with #crinktober or #crinktober2018. You’re also welcome to @ us. We are so excited to fill this blog with all your awesome art. Have fun you guys and stay turnt!
